snippet: NBC Universal on Tuesday named Jim Bell, who ran the “Today” show for seven and a half years, the full-time executive producer of the Olympics.
abstract: Producer Jim Bell leaves Today show after seven years to become full-time executive producer of the Olympics for NBC.
lead_paragraph: NBC Universal on Tuesday named Jim Bell, who ran the “Today” show for seven and a half years, the full-time executive producer of the Olympics.

headline.seo: Producer Leaves ‘Today’ Show After 7 Years to Direct Olympics for NBC Universal
headline.main: Producer Leaves ‘Today’ Show to Direct Olympics for NBC Universal
headline.print_headline: Producer Leaves ‘Today’ Show After 7 Years to Direct Olympics for NBC Universal
